joke_cmd.name: joke
joke_cmd.title: Pokémon Joke
joke_cmd.description: Warning: It's not because you don't find the joke funny that it is not a joke
joke_cmd.joke_1: It is the tale of a wild Pikachu. He runs, runs and runs again when suddenly he stumbles on a rock, then he becomes a Raichu.
joke_cmd.joke_2:
Arceus appears in front of 3 Pokémons. 

Pikachu: oh my god it's god! 
Squirtle: Oh great Arceus we are nothing without you!
Mew: Bitch please, you would not exist without me.
joke_cmd.joke_3:
What TV show about dancing do Pokémon love?

Dancing with the Staryus.
joke_cmd.joke_4:
What is a Pokémon fan’s favorite place to go in France?

Paras!
joke_cmd.joke_5:
I wish you were the ground and I was a Diglett.

Because then I could be inside of you.
joke_cmd.joke_6:
You must be a Charmander.

Because you’re making me hot.
joke_cmd.joke_7: Is that a Bellsprout in your pants or are you just happy to see me?
joke_cmd.joke_8:
What did Pikachu say when ash fell off a cliff?

 “Pikachu”, that’s all he can say.
joke_cmd.joke_9: What is a Primeape? A Mankey which became an expert in trolling.
joke_cmd.joke_10:
Hey miss you are so fresh.

 I wish I could Wobbuffet you!
joke_cmd.joke_11: What noise a firearm is making ? Rattata.
joke_cmd.joke_12: What does a Pokémon player take to not stink? Some Deoxys.
joke_cmd.joke_13: Go make your Jynx on my Jigglypuff.
joke_cmd.joke_14: Do you want to see my Poké Balls?
joke_cmd.joke_15: It's not because of the team that I'm called the Rocket
joke_cmd.joke_16: Hi, do you want to see my Weedle?
joke_cmd.joke_17: When I see you it's Hydro Pump in my cheeky.
joke_cmd.joke_18: I overheard someone telling Pokémon jokes, but I couldn't catch 'em all.
joke_cmd.joke_19: According to recent surveys, fans of Pokémon love electric type the most. These results are shocking.
joke_cmd.joke_20:
Why should you always bring Charmander camping?

He's the fire starter.
joke_cmd.joke_21:
How is the milk of a drugged Miltank called?

Weewee Milk.
joke_cmd.joke_22:
What is the favorite color of a Meowth?

Cyan, because they wish to be a Per-sian.
joke_cmd.joke_23:
What does one Geodude say to the other Geodude?

 Let’s rock!
joke_cmd.joke_24:
What appears over Ash’s head when he gets an idea?

 A LightBulbasaur.
joke_cmd.joke_25:
What do you call a Pokemon that wants to be a police officer?

 Magic-cop!
joke_cmd.joke_26:
How do you get Pikachu on a bus?

Poke him on!
joke_cmd.joke_27:
Why are Zigzagoon lying during mid-day ?

Because they want to evolve into Li-noone.
joke_cmd.joke_28:
- Hello Sir, do you have the collector figurine of Green Lanturn ? 
- Well no, sorry but it is out of Stock.
joke_cmd.joke_29:
Which Pokémon could also be a pirate?

 Arrrrrr-ceus.
joke_cmd.joke_30:
What’s Wailord’s favorite TV show?

 Whale of Fortune.
joke_cmd.joke_31:
What do you call a scout that likes to chew gum while climbing Pikes Peak?

 A Peak-A-Chewer!
joke_cmd.joke_32:
Which music style has had a lot of fame for a few last years?

The BeeDRILL!
joke_cmd.joke_33:
What is the secret car of Brock?

The ZuBatmobile!
joke_cmd.joke_34:
What is the origin of MAC OS X and Linux?

Onix. (Unix)
joke_cmd.joke_35:
What can appear in winter?

Snom! (snow)
joke_cmd.joke_36: It smells bad, do you have a deonidoran?
joke_cmd.joke_37: Babisharp doo-doo doo-doo, babisharp doo-doo doo-doo, babisharp doo-doo doo-doo, babisharp
joke_cmd.joke_38:
What are pop smoke’s two favorite pokemon ?

Excadrill and Beedrill.
joke_cmd.joke_39:
What do you call an old gorilla?

A Rillaboomer!
joke_cmd.joke_40:
What manga are you reading?

An Entei.
joke_cmd.joke_41: What does Brock say when he sees Nurse Joy? Tynamo ❤️ (Ti amo)
joke_cmd.joke_42:
Customer: I’m here to buy new RAM sticks for my PC. What do you have to offer me?
Seller : We have ReshiRAM 32GB.
joke_cmd.joke_43:
What is the capital of Italy?

ZekRom!
joke_cmd.joke_44:
What does a cat when it is hungry?

He Mew.
joke_cmd.joke_45: To win the party, you need to Ghetsis points more.
joke_cmd.joke_46: Have you ever heard of the Greek goddess Hatenna?
joke_cmd.joke_47:
I love to eat apple pie and you?
I prefer Cater pie.
joke_cmd.joke_48: I will eraticate the world mouahahaha!!
joke_cmd.joke_49:
What does an artist read?

An Arbok!
joke_cmd.joke_50: In this book, there are ninetales.
joke_cmd.joke_51:
Do you know that there is a pokemon that already existed during the time of the dinosaurs?
Its name is Venusaur.
joke_cmd.joke_52:
Can we named cerberus dugtrio?
Because it is a dog with 3 heads!
joke_cmd.joke_53:
Father: What did you learn today at school?
Son: I studied blitzle krieg in history class.
joke_cmd.joke_54:
Friend: Want to race ?
Me: No, you are too slowbro.
joke_cmd.joke_55: Do you know the Haunter x Haunter manga? It is awesome!
